column1: Channarayapatna is a town and taluka headquarters in Hassan district of Karnataka
column2: India. It lies on the Bangalore-Mangalore National Highway 75 in Karnataka

column1: Channarayapatna Taluka is one of the eight talukas in Hassan district of Karnataka state. There are 40 panchayat villages in Channarayapatna Taluka
Channarayapatna is in Hassan District in Karnataka state
column2: India and located at 12.90°N 76.39°E﻿ / 12.90; 76.39. It has an average elevation of 827 metres (2716 ft).

column3: 400. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Channarayapatna has an average literacy rate of 73%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 78% and female literacy of 68%. 11% of the population is under 6 years of age.

column1: Agriculture is the major economic activity. Sugarcane & Coconut are the leading commercial crops
column5: and Paddy.  The taluk also has mineral reserves
